topic.title: Projects
topic.p: Each project is uniquely identified by a project token. This token is used for uploading %product% reports.

chapter.title: Create a project
chapter.p: During the onboarding stage, Qodana Cloud helps you create a project, so you need this step only for creating additional projects.
On a team page, click the Create project button.

chapter.title: Manage a project
chapter.p: After the project was created, on the project click Generate token to generate a unique project token for it. Using this token, %product% can upload reports as described in the section.
Once the token is generated, you can regenerate it, rename the project, or delete the project.
